channel.title: Dwarven Miner instead of Bandos 0_o?
channel.description:
When I spawn the Bandos Npc, a lil dwarven miner shows up hehe :) I checked the entityDef, Bandos is in there, checked the NpcHandler, and all emotes are there also. Why is Bandos still showing up as a dwarf who attacks me instead of the actual Bandos? Lol Im just a beginner so bear with me please
Thanks, Basak

item.title: Dwarven Miner instead of Bandos 0_o?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

in player.java search for npctype, you should see something like

writeBits(12, npcType);

change the 12 to 14, should fix the npcs

Read full topic

item.title: Dwarven Miner instead of Bandos 0_o?
item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

Dont listen to anyone who said anything here.

Go to your NPC list, search “graardor”, and if he’s in there, it’s most likely under a different ID. Just go back to your server files and change all the dwarve’s Ids to the actual Bandos ids.

Post back if your still not sure what to do.

Read full topic

item.title: Dwarven Miner instead of Bandos 0_o?
item.dc:creator: @dutchboy dutchboy
item.description:
@dutchboy wrote:

U need to increase the bits.
I fargot where it was but ya.
Or if you also become dwarf when using pnpc then there’s something wrong in ur npcs code(class5)

Read full topic

item.title: Dwarven Miner instead of Bandos 0_o?
item.dc:creator: @Kamran1 Kamran1
item.description:
@Kamran1 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:394052”][quote author=ITI Basak ITI link=topic=491238.msg3592330#msg3592330 date=1304741331]
When I spawn the Bandos Npc, a lil dwarven miner shows up hehe I checked the entityDef, Bandos is in there, checked the NpcHandler, and all emotes are there also. Why is Bandos still showing up as a dwarf who attacks me instead of the actual Bandos? Lol Im just a beginner so bear with me please

Thanks, Basak
[/quote]

Chances are the model is incorrect, either in the cache or Class9 (or whatever the class is)[/quote]

Class5

Class9 is used for interfaces.

@Topic-

Look around for Godwars Boss tutorials.

Read full topic

item.title: Dwarven Miner instead of Bandos 0_o?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ITI Basak ITI:

Any chance I could get you to tv with me? Id really like to learn. Once I learn something I never forget You were all where I am now at one point or another

Actually no. I’ve never added any custom items/objects/npcs/etc. And I don’t use Teamviewer.
